summary:
Add new "Stand Alone Vanilla Retexture Heavy Armor" to the game
for player that enjoy using Heavy armor
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]Storm Knight Armor
[/b]
Add new "Stand Alone Vanilla Retexture Heavy Armor" to the game
for player that enjoy using Heavy armor
[u][b]
[/b][/u][u][b]Updated Version 1.1[/b][/u]
Add new stand alone open helmet as
Storm Knight Helmet (male only)

Armor Type :
Male Only

Armor Rating :
The armor Rating are the same as Steel Plate Armor

Craftable :
Under Steel Armor

[b]TES V -Skyrim Mods: Strom Knight Armor by Fachry
[/b]
[youtube]ifNU6qdTFlY[/youtube]

Big Thanks for the video by Nozi87
Chekout and subscribe to his youtube page for more skyrim mods videos
Link : https://www.youtube.com/user/nozi87

[b]Recquared :[/b] Skyrim.esm

[b]Installation : [/b]

NMM or copy to data folder

[b]Uninstall : [/b]

Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder
[b]
[/b][b][/b][b]issue :[/b]
There are some clipping issue around the cape part that i don't know how fix it.

[b]Credit : [/b]

BETHESDA

Open Faced Helmets by MadCat221
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4866

Please leave a comment and endorsement
"Thank you for download"[/center]
author: Fachry
